title: Application Support - QuickBooks Network Error
description: A user reports they are unable to open their QuickBooks company file, which is hosted on a server.

tasks.description: Verify the user can ping the QuickBooks server.
tasks.expected_outcome: The server is reachable on the network.

tasks.description: Check the QuickBooks Database Server Manager service on the server.
tasks.expected_outcome: Technician finds the service has stopped.

tasks.description: Restart the QuickBooks Database Server Manager service.
tasks.expected_outcome: The user is now able to open the company file successfully.
